page.title: 02RESIDENTIAL AREAS OF SANDY
page.content: HOUSING IN SANDY IS A COMBINATION OF OLD AND MODERN. CEDAR GARDENS IS A CUL-DE-SAC WHICH IS QUITE MODERN. THERE ARE EIGHTEEN HOUSES AND THEY WERE BUILT ABOUT TEN YEARS AGO. THEY WERE BUILT IN THE LARGE GARDEN OF A HOUSE CALLED 'THE TOWERS' AND IT BELONGED TO VISCOUNT PEEL. THE HIGH STREET: MOST OF THE HOUSES WERE BUILT IN THE EARLY 1900S AND ARE EITHER TERRACED OR SEMI-DETACHED. NUMBER 103 USED TO BE THE GREYHOUND HOTEL, AND NUMBER 99 USED TO BE A DAME SCHOOL. FILLAND COURT: BEFORE THE ESTATE WAS BUILT ABOUT 17YEARS AGO THE GROUND WAS USED FOR AGRICULTURE. THERE ARE SEVERAL TYPES OF HOUSES INCLUDING SEMI-DETACHED, DETACHED. THERE ARE NO SHOPS ON THE ESTATE BUT THE MAIN SHOPPING AREA IS ONLY 5 MINUTES AWAY.
